title: Endometriosis: it's not in your head, it's in your pelvis
features: , Bethany Stahl recounts authentic experiences of discovering she was living with a chronic illness for fifteen years.Diagnosing

. Stahl recounts her life from eleven to twenty-six years old. She shares the hardships of crippling pain, depression, sex, infertility, and the struggle to find a doctor to take her symptoms seriously.Join her in uncovering the truth as she strives to find the silver lining to living with an "invisible illness".
